      • Challenge

        public Challenge(java.lang.String title,
                 java.lang.String description,
                 int completionTime,
                 int idCreator)
        Creates a new challenge and inserts it into the database
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the challenge
        description - The challenge description
        completionTime - The time to complete the challenge in seconds
        idCreator - User-ID of user creating the challenge
